00034 @synthesize title=title_, titleFont=titleFont_, strokeWidth=strokeWidth_, borderColor=borderColor_, etchedColor=etchedColor_, cornerRadius=cornerRadius_, 
00035 color=color_, titleColor=titleColor_, alternateColor=alternateColor_, shadingType=shadingType_, 
00036 highlightedColor=highlightedColor_, highlightedTitleColor=highlightedTitleColor_, highlightedAlternateColor=highlightedAlternateColor_, highlightedShadingType=highlightedShadingType_, 
00037 disabledTitleColor=disabledTitleColor_, disabledColor=disabledColor_, disabledAlternateColor=disabledAlternateColor_, disabledShadingType=disabledShadingType_;

00039 - (id)initWithFrame:(CGRect)frame {
00040   if ((self = [super initWithFrame:frame])) {
00041     self.backgroundColor = [UIColor clearColor];
00042     self.opaque = NO;
00043     
00044     self.titleFont = [UIFont fontWithName:@"Helvetica-Bold" size:14];
00045     self.cornerRadius = 10.0;
00046     self.strokeWidth = 0.5;   
00047     
00048     self.borderColor = [UIColor blackColor];
00049 
00050     // Normal: Bluish text on white background
00051     self.titleColor = [UIColor colorWithRed:(CGFloat)(77.0/255.0) green:(CGFloat)(95.0/255.0) blue:(CGFloat)(154.0/255.0) alpha:(CGFloat)1.0];
00052     self.shadingType = GHUIButtonShadingTypeNone;
00053     self.color = [UIColor whiteColor];    
00054     
00055     // Highlighted: White text on gray linear shading
00056     self.highlightedTitleColor = [UIColor whiteColor];
00057     self.highlightedShadingType = GHUIButtonShadingTypeLinear;
00058     self.highlightedColor = [UIColor colorWithRed:0.8 green:0.8 blue:0.8 alpha:1.0];
00059     self.highlightedAlternateColor = [UIColor colorWithRed:0.675 green:0.675 blue:0.675 alpha:1.0];
00060   }
00061   return self;
00062 }

00075   [super dealloc];

00082 + (GHUIButton *)blueButtonWithTitle:(NSString *)title frame:(CGRect)frame {
00083   GHUIButton *button = [[[GHUIButton alloc] initWithFrame:frame] autorelease];
00084   button.title = title;
00085   button.titleColor = [UIColor whiteColor];
00086   button.color = [UIColor colorWithRed:0.247 green:0.514 blue:0.953 alpha:1.0];
00087   button.alternateColor = [UIColor colorWithRed:0.114 green:0.333 blue:0.871 alpha:1.0];
00088   button.shadingType = GHUIButtonShadingTypeLinear;
00089   return button;  
00090 }

00128 
00129 // For shading
00130 typedef struct {
00131   CGFloat red1, green1, blue1, alpha1;
00132   CGFloat red2, green2, blue2, alpha2;
00133 } _GHUIButtonTwoColors;
00134 
00135 // Only uses main color
00136 void _horizontalEdgeColorBlendFunction(void *info, const float *in, float *out) {
00137   _GHUIButtonTwoColors *twoColors = (_GHUIButtonTwoColors *)info;
00138 
00139   float v = *in;
00140   if (v < 0.5) {
00141     v = (v * 2.0) * 0.3 + 0.6222;
00142     *out++ = 1.0 - v + twoColors->red1 * v;
00143     *out++ = 1.0 - v + twoColors->green1 * v;
00144     *out++ = 1.0 - v + twoColors->blue1 * v;
00145     *out++ = 1.0 - v + twoColors->alpha1 * v;
00146   } else {
00147     *out++ = twoColors->red2;
00148     *out++ = twoColors->green2;
00149     *out++ = twoColors->blue2;
00150     *out++ = twoColors->alpha2;
00151   }
00152 }
00153 
00154 void _linearColorBlendFunction(void *info, const float *in, float *out) {
00155   _GHUIButtonTwoColors *twoColors = info;
00156   
00157   out[0] = (1.0 - *in) * twoColors->red1 + *in * twoColors->red2;
00158   out[1] = (1.0 - *in) * twoColors->green1 + *in * twoColors->green2;
00159   out[2] = (1.0 - *in) * twoColors->blue1 + *in * twoColors->blue2;
00160   out[3] = (1.0 - *in) * twoColors->alpha1 + *in * twoColors->alpha2;
00161 }
00162 
00163 void _colorReleaseInfoFunction(void *info) {
00164   free(info);
00165 }
00166 
00167 static const CGFunctionCallbacks linearFunctionCallbacks = {0, &_linearColorBlendFunction, &_colorReleaseInfoFunction};
00168 static const CGFunctionCallbacks horizontalEdgeFunctionCallbacks = {0, &_horizontalEdgeColorBlendFunction, &_colorReleaseInfoFunction};
00169 
00170 void DrawShading(CGContextRef context, UIColor *color, UIColor *alternateColor, CGSize size, GHUIButtonShadingType shadingType) {
00171   const CGFunctionCallbacks *callbacks;
00172   if (shadingType == GHUIButtonShadingTypeHorizontalEdge) {
00173     callbacks = &horizontalEdgeFunctionCallbacks;
00174   } else if (shadingType == GHUIButtonShadingTypeLinear) {
00175     callbacks = &linearFunctionCallbacks;
00176   } else {
00177     return;
00178   }
00179   
00180   CGColorSpaceRef colorSpace = CGColorSpaceCreateDeviceRGB();
00181 
00182   _GHUIButtonTwoColors *twoColors = malloc(sizeof(_GHUIButtonTwoColors));
00183   [color gh_getRed:&twoColors->red1 green:&twoColors->green1 blue:&twoColors->blue1 alpha:&twoColors->alpha1];
00184   [alternateColor gh_getRed:&twoColors->red2 green:&twoColors->green2 blue:&twoColors->blue2 alpha:&twoColors->alpha2];
00185   
00186   static const float domainAndRange[8] = {0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 1.0};
00187   
00188   CGFunctionRef blendFunctionRef = CGFunctionCreate(twoColors, 1, domainAndRange, 4, domainAndRange, callbacks);
00189   CGShadingRef shading = CGShadingCreateAxial(colorSpace, CGPointMake(0, 0), CGPointMake(0, size.height), blendFunctionRef, YES, YES);
00190   CGContextDrawShading(context, shading);
00191   CGShadingRelease(shading);
00192   CGFunctionRelease(blendFunctionRef);
00193   CGColorSpaceRelease(colorSpace);
00194 } 
00195 
00196 - (UIColor *)textColorForState:(UIControlState)state {
00197   if (highlightedTitleColor_ && (state == UIControlStateHighlighted)) {
00198     return highlightedTitleColor_;
00199   } else if (disabledTitleColor_ && (state == UIControlStateDisabled)) {
00200     return disabledTitleColor_;
00201   } else if (titleColor_) {
00202     return titleColor_;
00203   } else {
00204     return [UIColor blackColor];
00205   }
00206 }
00207 
00208 - (void)drawRect:(CGRect)rect {
00209   CGContextRef context = UIGraphicsGetCurrentContext(); 
00210   
00211   UIControlState state = self.state;
00212   CGRect bounds = self.bounds;  
00213   CGSize size = bounds.size;
00214   
00215   BOOL isHighlighted = (state == UIControlStateHighlighted);
00216   BOOL isDisabled = (state == UIControlStateDisabled);
00217   
00218   GHUIButtonShadingType shadingType = shadingType_;
00219   UIColor *color = color_;
00220   UIColor *alternateColor = alternateColor_;
00221     
00222   if (isDisabled) {
00223     if (disabledShadingType_ != GHUIButtonShadingTypeUnknown) shadingType = disabledShadingType_;
00224     if (disabledColor_) color = disabledColor_;
00225     if (disabledAlternateColor_) alternateColor = disabledAlternateColor_;    
00226   } else if (isHighlighted || self.isTracking) {
00227     if (highlightedShadingType_ != GHUIButtonShadingTypeUnknown) shadingType = highlightedShadingType_;
00228     if (highlightedColor_) color = highlightedColor_;
00229     if (highlightedAlternateColor_) alternateColor = highlightedAlternateColor_;
00230   }
00231   
00232   UIColor *fillColor = color;
00233   
00234   if (color && shadingType != GHUIButtonShadingTypeNone) {
00235     GHContextAddRoundedRect(context, bounds, cornerRadius_, cornerRadius_, strokeWidth_);
00236     CGContextClip(context);
00237     DrawShading(context, color, alternateColor, self.bounds.size, shadingType);
00238     fillColor = nil;
00239   }
00240   
00241   GHContextDrawRoundedRect(context, bounds, [fillColor CGColor], [borderColor_ CGColor], strokeWidth_, cornerRadius_, cornerRadius_);
00242   
00243   CGColorRef textColor = [self textColorForState:state].CGColor;
00244   
00245   UIFont *font = titleFont_;
00246   if (!font) font = [UIFont boldSystemFontOfSize:14.0];
00247   
00248   NSArray *lines;
00249   
00250   if ([title_ gh_contains:@"\n" options:0]) {
00251     lines = [title_ componentsSeparatedByString:@"\n"]; 
00252     
00253 // // Auto wrapping; Untested
00254 //  } else if (titleSize.height > size.height) {
00255 //    lines = [NSMutableArray array];
00256 //    NSMutableString *line = [NSMutableString string];
00257 //    CGFloat currentWidth = 0;   
00258 //    for(NSString *word in [title_ gh_cutWithString:@" " options:0]) {
00259 //      CGSize wordSize = [word sizeWithFont:font];
00260 //      if ((wordSize.width + currentWidth) > size.width) {
00261 //        [lines addObject:line];
00262 //        currentWidth = wordSize.width;
00263 //        line = [NSMutableString stringWithString:word];     
00264 //      } else {      
00265 //        [line appendFormat:word];
00266 //        currentWidth += wordSize.width;
00267 //      }   
00268 //    }
00269     
00270   } else {
00271     lines = [NSArray arrayWithObject:title_];
00272   }
00273 
00274   CGFloat lineHeight = font.pointSize;
00275   CGFloat lineGap = 4.0;
00276   CGFloat y = 0;
00277   
00278   // If we have more than 1 line calculate height based on lineHeight and gap
00279   // Otherwise use sizeWithFont (for better precision)
00280   if ([lines count] > 1) {
00281     y = size.height/2.0 - ((lineHeight * [lines count]) + (lineGap * ([lines count] - 1)))/2.0; 
00282   } else {
00283     CGSize titleSize = [title_ sizeWithFont:font];
00284     y = size.height/2.0 - titleSize.height/2.0;
00285   }
00286   
00287   for(NSString *line in lines) {
00288     CGSize lineSize = [line sizeWithFont:font];
00289     CGFloat x = size.width/2.0 - lineSize.width/2.0;
00290     
00291     if (etchedColor_ && !isHighlighted && !isDisabled) {
00292       CGContextSetFillColorWithColor(context, etchedColor_.CGColor);
00293       [line drawAtPoint:CGPointMake(x+1, y) forWidth:size.width withFont:font lineBreakMode:UILineBreakModeWordWrap];
00294     }
00295     
00296     CGContextSetFillColorWithColor(context, textColor);
00297     [line drawAtPoint:CGPointMake(x, y) forWidth:size.width withFont:font lineBreakMode:UILineBreakModeWordWrap];
00298     
00299     y += lineHeight + lineGap;
00300   }
00301 }

00303 #pragma mark Touch
00304 
00305 - (void)_removeHighlight {
00306   self.highlighted = NO;
00307   [self setNeedsDisplay];
00308 }
00309 
00310 - (void)touchesBegan:(NSSet *)touches withEvent:(UIEvent *)event {  
00311   self.highlighted = YES;
00312   [self setNeedsDisplay];
00313   [super touchesBegan:touches withEvent:event];
00314 }
00315 
00316 - (void)touchesEnded:(NSSet *)touches withEvent:(UIEvent *)event {
00317   [self _removeHighlight];
00318   [super touchesEnded:touches withEvent:event];
00319 }
00320 
00321 - (void)touchesCancelled:(NSSet *)touches withEvent:(UIEvent *)event {
00322   [self _removeHighlight];
00323   [super touchesCancelled:touches withEvent:event];
00324 }
